Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
import src

from services.queryer import Queryer

queryer = Queryer\(\)
variables = {
    ''{id}'': ''bytedance'',
    ''{name_cn}'': ''字节跳动'',
    ''{name_en}'': ''ByteDance'',
    ''{avatar}'': ''''
}

print\(''测试 Queryer 单次查询（仅第1个，max_results=2）...''\)
result = queryer.research\(
    template_name=''company_query.yaml'',
    variables=variables,
    max_results=2
\)

print\(f''成功: {result[""success""]}''\)
if result[''success'']:
    print\(f''结果数量: {len\(result[""results""]\)}''\)
    for i, r in enumerate\(result[''results''], 1\):
        content = r[''content'']
        print\(f''结果{i}: 长度={len\(content\)}, 前100字符={content[:100]}''\)
else:
    print\(f''错误: {result[""error""]}''\)
")
